title: Apple Stock Downgraded by Barclays — TradingView News
text: Apple Inc. shares have experienced a decline, with a 3.6% fall on a previous day and a further 0.4% drop in premarket trading. The company's stock has been downgraded from Equal-Weight to Underweight by Barclays, with the price target reduced from $161 to $160. Analysts have expressed concerns about Apple's ability to demonstrate growth and innovation, particularly in the field of artificial intelligence. It has been noted that Apple appears to be in an innovation rut, especially within the handset and watch form factors.
